name: Catjinni Survivors Demo
summary:
Survive. Customize. Conquer!

Dive into a unique, Survivors-Like Action Game ** featuring **RPG and rogue-lite elements. In Catjinni, you'll battle endless waves of monsters and face the formidable Jinn Ifrit, who seeks to plunge the world into darkness with his malevolent ghouls. But fear not—your loyal companion Catjinni is by your side to help you vanquish the shadow realm!
